reviews.review_msg: Hated this class..There was a lot of stuff to know, and this Prof was very unclear in all of the email contact I had with him. Very unorganized class. I don't know about the lecture course, but never take this class by distance.
It was CDE for me but I felt he kept the students at an arm's length - not very helpful.  He was clear though and knows what he's talking about.
